definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: With the sea on three sides, Sperya has abundpert maritime resources.
sentences.chinese: 三亚三面环海，有着厚实的海洋资源。

sentences.english: In the evenings, or in cold weather, they wore identical heavy navy-blue sailor's sweaters.
sentences.chinese: 在晚上，或天冷时，他们穿着同样的厚实的海军蓝。

sentences.english: The Company in North China are a large company has a position of relative strength.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是华北地区的一家较大的有雄厚实力的公司。

sentences.english: Students' mathematics "double bases" and mathematics cognition base are not solid.
sentences.chinese: 我国学生数学双基与数学认知基础并不厚实。

sentences.english: The brawny big tree had cast a deep impression in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 古枫树那粗壮厚实的身影已深深地印在我的脑海里。

sentences.english: A sovereign fell, Bright and new, on the soft pile of the tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 一枚金镑，锃亮而崭新，落在厚实柔软的桌布上。

sentences.english: Their thick hide sports sparse bristles and sensory hairs.
sentences.chinese: 它们厚实的象皮长有刚毛和敏感的毛发。

sentences.english: Across the Atlantic, Blair's chunky memoir will seem even more antique.
sentences.chinese: 大洋对岸，布莱尔厚厚实实的自传就更显得过时。

sentences.english: A superb Indonesian arabica with a smooth, dense flavor, almost syrupy body.
sentences.chinese: 厚实深沉的印尼小果咖啡，口感奇特，糖浆般浓郁。

sentences.english: The overalls I was wearing were of very thick cloth and no serious damage had been done.
sentences.chinese: 我穿的工装裤料子很厚实，我的损伤不算严重。

sentences.english: Pads are thick and springy while nails are strong and dark colored.
sentences.chinese: 脚垫厚实而有弹性，趾甲坚硬而且颜色深。

sentences.english: I could hear the wives behind the thick door of our inner room, stirring there.
sentences.chinese: 透过厚实的门板，听得见隔壁房里众嫔妃沙沙的声音。

sentences.english: You'll have to pad out the chair with some more cloth before recovering it.
sentences.chinese: 罩之前，你须先用些布把椅子垫厚实了。

sentences.english: Fragmentation, Liu Yu-thick cut pieces of the system-Hill, excellent ornamental effect.
sentences.chinese: 块度大，玉料厚实，琢制山子件，观赏效果佳。

sentences.english: "Elder brother Xuan returns?Outside snow accumulates thick solid. "Fix to far ask a way.
sentences.chinese: “轩哥，还去吗？外面雪积厚实了。”修远问道。

definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress
flexible/not rigid/spongy/soft or runny (not set hard)/loose (soil)
